projects.project_title: Data Science and Artificial Intelligent Project: Anime Popularity Prediction
details: Designed an Artificial Intelligent model to estimate anime popularity rating using neural network and data pre-processing strategies.
Applied predictive analytics techniques to empower producers to make data-driven decisions when releasing anime, demonstrating expertise in data science and AI principles.
Utilized relevant programming languages and tools, showcasing proficiency in data processing, extraction, and analysis.
Designed a scalable and maintainable SQL database for a bookstore, ensuring data quality and integrity through entity-relationship modeling in Microsoft SQL Server.
Defined efficient SQL queries to retrieve accurate data, highlighting expertise in database design, data modeling, and query optimization.
Demonstrated understanding of data analysis and manipulation, utilizing SQL to extract insights from the database.
